#summary menu widget reference

= menu widget =

A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html GtkMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html GtkImageMenuItem] with a submenu.

----

== Definition ==

{{{
<menu tag_attr="value"...>
	menu...
	menuitem...
	<label>text</label>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<height>value</height>
	<width>value</width>
	<input>command</input>
	<sensitive>state</sensitive>
	<action>activity</action>...
	<action signal="type">activity</action>...
	<action type="function">parameter</action>...
</menu>
}}}

"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==

See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html#GtkImageMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkImageMenuItem] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| block-function-signals || Block signal emissions from functions || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| icon-name^[1]^ || GTK theme icon name ||  || 0.7.21 ||
|| stock-id || GTK stock icon ID || {{{gtk-about}}}, {{{gtk-add}}}, ... ([http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Stock-Items.html#GTK-STOCK-ABOUT:CAPS full list]) || 0.7.21 ||
|| image-name || Image filename ||  || 0.7.21 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Signals ==

The default signal is "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem-activate activate]", emitted when the item is activated.

See also the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.signals GtkMenuItem] widget and ancestor class signals.

== Functions ==

The following functions can be performed upon this widget by any widget capable of emitting signals:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| enable || Sensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| disable || Desensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| show || Show widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| hide || Hide widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| activate || Activate widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| refresh || Reload input data || Shell variable name || 0.7.21 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

The following general functions can be performed by any widget capable of emitting signals:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| command || Execute command || Shell command || ||
|| exit || Exit dialog || A value for the {{{EXIT}}} shell variable || ||
|| closewindow || Close dialog || Shell variable name || ||
|| launch || Launch dialog || Shell variable name || ||
|| presentwindow || [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWindow.html#gtk-window-present Present] dialog || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Notes ==

1. Theme icons default to 16 and do not scale or refresh (the height or width directives can be used to request a size).

This widget must be the child of a [menubar] widget or another menu widget.
